bibl.title: Scribal Habits in Early Papyri: A Study in the Corruption of the Text.
bibl.note: Republié dans: Studies in Methodology in Textual Criticism of the New Testament (Leiden, 1969) pp. 106-124, sous le titre Method in Evaluating Scribal Habits. A Study of P45, P66, P75.
